Header: Bribery Commission questions MP Sajin De Vass Gunawardena
Content: MP Sajin De Vass Gunawardena has been questioned by the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption. The Bribery Commission said that the statement was recorded from the MP taking a number of complaints that were lodged against him into consideration. This situation was confirmed to News1st by the commissioner of the Bribery commission.
